fields.name: Prod:
fields.value: May be used on a player who fails to participate in the most recent day, evening, or night phase. You will receive a list of players targetable by this ability.

fields.name: Modkill (Charge 50%):
fields.value: May be used on a player who fails to participate in the most recent day, evening, or night phase, and has been prodded before. Attack your target.

fields.name: Sub but broken:
fields.value: ** If you successfully modkill a player, you may put a spectator (not spoiled) with any role in their place.

fields.name: Hello Subber (Passive):
fields.value: In addition to your regular Hello Neighbor chat, you may open an HN with one of your subs each night.

fields.name: TWOW Performance Incentive (Passive):
fields.value: You may perform an unlimited number of abilities any night you score above 50%.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: You win if a majority of your subs win.
